orderbookrl.tests package¶

Submodules¶

orderbookrl.tests.test_adv module¶

orderbookrl.tests.test_adv.compute_advantages(rollout, last_r, gamma=0.9, lambda_=1.0, use_gae=True)[source]¶

Given a rollout, compute its value targets and the advantage.

Args:
rollout (SampleBatch): SampleBatch of a single trajectory last_r (float): Value estimation for last observation gamma (float): Discount factor. lambda_ (float): Parameter for GAE use_gae (bool): Using Generalized Advantage Estamation
Returns:
SampleBatch (SampleBatch): Object with experience from rollout and
processed rewards.
class orderbookrl.tests.test_adv.AdvPPOGraph(observation_space, action_space, config, existing_inputs=None)[source]¶

Bases: ray.rllib.agents.ppo.ppo_policy_graph.PPOPolicyGraph

postprocess_trajectory(sample_batch, other_agent_batches=None)[source]¶

Implements algorithm-specific trajectory postprocessing.

This will be called on each trajectory fragment computed during policy evaluation. Each fragment is guaranteed to be only from one episode.

Arguments:
sample_batch (SampleBatch): batch of experiences for the policy,
which will contain at most one episode trajectory.
other_agent_batches (dict): In a multi-agent env, this contains a
mapping of agent ids to (policy_graph, agent_batch) tuples containing the policy graph and experiences of the other agent.
Returns:
SampleBatch: postprocessed sample batch.
class orderbookrl.tests.test_adv.PPOAdv(config=None, env=None, logger_creator=None)[source]¶
